Articles.Content:
When constructing a rocket the rotate and translate gizmo has a limit on how far you can translate a part along it's respective axis.  This limit inhibits rocket design.

 

Example:
---

In the attached image the spaceplane boosters have shifted the center of mass below the center of lift.  To fix this the boosters need to be translated up on the Z axis, however, the maximum Z translation has been reached and the booster cannot be translated up any further.
